source.name: EPA Waste Stream Sampling: Response to BP Oil Spill
source.description: EPA is collecting samples of waste that are temporarily stored at waste staging areas prior to recycling or final disposal of the waste materials. EPA will also collect representative samples of oily solid waste, liquid wastes that are sent to underground injection and/or non-reclaimable liquids that are sent for processing. The waste sampling will be conducted two times per month.
